writing_guidelines.description: Must be listed in the copy.
Refer and comply to the Clothes Captioning guidelines.
Must comply with Textile Fiber Products Identification and Wool Product Labeling Act.
No plastic product should make the claim of biodegradable or compostable.
Do not make antimicrobial, hypo-allergenic or similar claims without vendor substantiation.
Do not make eco-friendly/sustainability claims without vendor substantiation.
Do not make claims that items are organic or made from organic textiles without substantiation.
Do not make claims that an item will improve or better life.
Do not state that items are made of bamboo; use bamboo made from rayon instead.
Do not use Military. State as military-inspired.
Do not use Vintage. State as vintage-inspired or retro.
Lithium batteries must be identified and detailed in the product description.
